security: Revealing the names and pass numbers of individuals involved in the Inter-agency Defector Committee could expose their identities and potentially compromise their security or the operations of the committee. Quoting directly: 'It is requested that CIA Building Passes be removed for the following individuals who are Members or Alternate Members of the Inter-agency Defector Committee:' followed by specific names and pass numbers.
summary: A memorandum requesting the removal of CIA building passes for members and alternate members of the Inter-agency Defector Committee and modification of access for some members.
summary_one_paragraph: On December 16, 1958, a memorandum from John E. Boyle, Deputy/CDC, was sent to the Chief of Physical Security requesting the removal of CIA Building Passes for specific individuals who are members or alternate members of the Inter-agency Defector Committee, including Mrs. Dorothe K. Matlack and Major Earnest E. Livaditis from the Army, and Major Warren B. Reid and Colonel Jas T. Bull from the Air Force. The memo also requests the addition of specific buildings to the passes of Mrs. Matlack and Major Livaditis.
title: Removal of CIA Building Passes
